abstract: The two industry Goliaths are discussing a partnership that would give Google’s search service a prominent spot on the screens of Verizon phones, according to people briefed on the talks.
snippet: The two industry Goliaths are discussing a partnership that would give Google’s search service a prominent spot on the screens of Verizon phones, according to people briefed on the talks.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Wireless and Google, two industry Goliaths that have seen each other as potential rivals, are discussing a partnership that would give Google’s search service a prominent spot on the screens of Verizon phones, according to people briefed on the talks.

headline.main: Verizon Wireless Discusses a Mobile Search Deal With Google
headline.print_headline: Google Discusses Deal With Verizon Wireless

byline.original: By Laura M. Holson and Miguel Helft
